dpcpp   -O3 -fsycl -std=c++11   -lOpenCL -lsycl CMakeFiles/crs-sycl2.dir/src/log.cpp.o CMakeFiles/crs-sycl2.dir/src/su_trace.cpp.o CMakeFiles/crs-sycl2.dir/src/su_gather.cpp.o CMakeFiles/crs-sycl2.dir/src/su_cdp.cpp.o CMakeFiles/crs-sycl2.dir/src/parser.cpp.o CMakeFiles/crs-sycl2.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o crs-sycl2 -lm
